name: Quickclaw
description:
Take on the role of Dynamo City's newest vigilante Quickclaw in her fight against organized crime!



Dynamo city has been attacked by a dangerous alien race.





Luckily the heroes of earth intervened and eliminated the threat.







With the city in chaos many new super-villains took control of several neighborhoods.







With the bigger heroes engaged in global threats, only the new vigilante Quickclaw can save the day!



Rid the neighborhoods of crime and raise your reputation as a new vigilante.



Use quickclaw's feline abilities such as super jumps, speed and super-strength to fight and move quickly across the city's rooftops.



Face increasingly greater threats as the story progresses!



Experience the game from the point of view of two opposite characters, each with a certain style of play:





1) QUICKCLAW: the new vigilante, fast and powerful, she is suitable for the vast platform stages.





2) NIGHTSHADOWL: The terror of criminals, the A-class superhero, genetically enhanced and equipped with super armor and numerous gadgets to deal with crime, suitable for Metroidvania and Arcade-style levels to emphasize his brutal fighting style.







Bonus Levels:
Unlock these arcade-style bonus stages by collecting experience points during the main story.
These levels allow you to use characters with unique abilities at a specific point in the timeline to relive the most important moments of the story from the point of view of other heroes.



Updates:
Quickclaw will get new traversal, fight moves and abilities through game updates. The experience points collected in the main story are only to unlock the bonus levels.
Updates will include new graphics, story levels, skills and bonus levels with new charachters.
